overview: Tatay Pedro, an 82-year old homeless man choose to live in a cabinet of his old house at Sitio San Roque. He is one of the oldest residents from the said Sitio. After being relocated to Montalban where there is no means of living and far from the primary institutions such as schools and hospitals, he decided to get back to Sitio San Roque out of desperation and fight for their rights.
title: At Sitio San Roque
